Key Arguments: The Bill will be ineffective and curtail free speech.
Some information labeled as misinformation during COVID turned out to be true.
Governments and big tech/media were major sources of misinformation during COVID.
Free speech is a democratic principle and encourages scientific debate.
The Bill is an overreach and unjustified as there are already significant powers for emergencies.
Notable Quotes: George Orwell would find it familiar.
Free speech is important as a democratic principle.
This Bill is a major overreach that is unjustified.
